comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Either: Charles Day Lanier (1868-1945) or Charles Lanier (1837-1926)

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: At a glance, I'd guess the second. He looks over 53 to me.

comment.author: 56639876@N06
comment._content:
This is Charles Lanier, son of James F. D. Lanier.
Charles was born in Madison, Indiana, moved to NYC with his family around 1850. 
Became one of J. P. Morgans friends.
